title: You 2.0: Rebel With A Cause
description: Francesca Gino studies rebels — people who practice "positive deviance" and achieve incredible feats of imagination. They know how, and when, to break the rules that should be broken. So how can you activate your own inner non-conformist? We kick off this year's You 2.0 series by pondering this question.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
